title: EMILY's List President Stephanie Schriock | Beto Announces 2020 Bid and Trump Attacks Him: A Closer Look
description:
Seth takes a closer look at Beto O'Rourke jumping in the 2020 race and President Trump immediately attacking him.

Then, Emily's List President Stephanie Schriock talks about her organization, Hillary Clinton's 2016 loss and helping Democratic women across the country run for office. She also takes a few more questions exclusively for this podcast backstage at Studio 8G.

See Privacy Policy at https://art19.com/privacy and California Privacy Notice at https://art19.com/privacy#do-not-sell-my-info.
